reviewText: Ned's is one of my favorite shows, and i've already watched this season two set 3 times in the past month. the set comes with the entire season two and the episode quality is very nice.
We loved this show when it was airing on Nickelodeon so I knew we needed to own the DVDs. I just wish they had more than two seasons on DVD. There are so few shows as good as this one.

This show was one of Nickelodeon's best. Very funny and unlike some NICK shows today it was completely age appropriate and had nothing that made parents cringe. Season 2 of Ned's Declassified aired from 2005-2006 and followed Ned and his friends through their 7th grade year in middle school. Just a fun show to watch; filled with wacky and wild antics and some pretty useful tips for kids in middle school as well. This is actually the complete 2nd season(not one of Amazon's "best of" DVDs) but it was released only in Canada(along with Seasons 2 and 3 of Zoey 101) but now a few copies are making their way into the United States. Disappointing that Nick cancelled this show after just 3 seasons but thanks to a DVD company in Canada the entire series is available on DVD.

This will not play on a newer computer. It would not play on my Vista machine with either my LG DVD writer or my Sony Blu-Ray player, due to the hardware anti-copy provisions. It will play on my XP machine, but only in my older DVD player, not my LG DVD burner. The DVD player is old enough to not have those damned restrictions.
NOTE: I finally switched my older machine to Ubuntu Linux, with the same results.
The video quality is excellent, equal to commercial DVDs. The disk art and packaging are as good as commercial DVDs as well. And the show itself is great, very funny and good-natured. Well worth buying, I hope enough people do that Amazon releases the rest of the episodes.

With the deal struck between Nickelodeon and Amazon, we finnaly have various titles being released that I thought we would never see. Thank you Amazon! Now if only you could strike the same deal with Buena Vista Home Entertainment and get titles like X-Men, Spiderman, MMPR, and Digimon in Region 1 boxsets. I would gladly pay my hard earned money for titles like that.

I am 40 yrs. old and I love this show. It reminds me of a combination of Warner Bros. cartoons, old slapstick and screwball comedies. It's so good to see this show finally get the dvd treatment. There are only 8 of the 20 episodes of season 2 and they are 1)New Semester/Electives 2)Pep Rallies/Lunch 3)Your Body/Procrastination 4)Valentine's Day/School Websites 5)Asking Someone Out/Recycling 6)April's Fool Day/Excuses 7)Secrets/School Car Wash & 8)Spirit Week/Clothes. The transfers are beautiful and as good as could be hoped for. I know a lot of people will not want to buy this because it's not a complete season. Since they are only producing this on demand it is vitally important to purchase and let Amazon know that Ned's Declassified is wanted and should be released completely. The more they sell, the more likely they will be willing to release the rest. Now, hopefully, on to Season 3!

It's been a while since I last saw this show. All I have to say, is that if you ever run into problems in school, as ironic as it may seem, this show really does help (not really!) just kidding, this show remains in the heart of the 90's kids and anyone who was a preteen at this time. Great show!
Classic and funny. They never grow old.  Can watch with whole family!
Good
Always loved it!
Best ever middle school comedy
Funny

Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide is one of my favorite shows ever. I remember watching it when I was younger and related to a lot of the material. It really is just a goofy show with some unexplainable hijinks thrown in the mix. I would recommend this to the young and the old. It has great tips and a wonderful cast. The only down side is that season 3 never came out on dvd so I have to figure out some other way to get my fix.
Very funny
I really appreciate it, loving Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide!
I love ned's declassified school survival guide. It's awesome
Good show. Wholesome fun for kids.
A fun show about kids in middle school.  A great cast compliments these funny stories of kids and school, it is a shame that it lasted only three seasons.
great show
Our favorite Nick show. It is fun, actually informative and oh, so funny!!!
Awesome show that both Parents & Kids can enjoy together!!! Wish I could go higher that 5 stars!!
Great show
It was a gift for my daughter. She hasn't stopped watching it since she received it. Arrived on time also.
Most intertaining!!
This show is super funny! And, Ned gives great tips, actually. The characters seem to really be having fun. Good show.

I am a 51 year old Dad who enjoys watching this show with my two middle school age boys. This is a great show to watch with your kids. Fun and quirky, with likable characters and actors. It actually dispense valuable school survival tips for the middle school student! Each double episode focuses on a school issue that a student would be concerned about, ie.  Homework, relationships, school spirit,  classes,  bullies etc. Created by Scott Fellows,  who has a fun,  quirky style my boys and I find particularly funny and appealing. I highly recommend this show.  A favorite of mine and family.  :)
My son absolutely loves Ned.
Horrible

Great show I can't belive they canceled it, they should of done a high school too! :D I love this show so much, now I'm trying to find season 3 on DVD, but no luck finding it yet. So happy I get to watch these as much as I want (: yay!
It's a wonderful show for kids.
I've always loved this series...his tips actually work in real life too!!!
Me and my buddy are wayyyyyy past elementary school, but we love to get stoned and watch this show. It's hillarious!!
Love this show it's a classic! Very funny and relatable for all who gone to school or not
Its great i love it one of my old favorites shows will be a gift for my lil brother thank you.
Kids love it.
Great price amazing quality!
great show my daughters and i really enjoy the characters in this show as well as the tips.
HAHAHAHAHA!!! It was funny

My son loves this series.  He started watching them while in 5th grade, which gave him a good idea of what middle school would be like.  Each episode focuses on real issues that kids may encounter in school.  I would recommend it for any kid in middle school or about to start.
One of my favorite shows ever
Awesome show
better writing than the first season. I can literally watch episodes over and over again!
Cute show about the trials and fun that children encounter in middle school. My 11yr old son loves it, he laughs throughout the show.
It's a funny show with good advice. I'd recommend it to lots of people.

This is a great show that myself and my 13 year old son enjoy. The show discusses important topics, such as being organized, comparing body types, competition, making excuses, and more. My son laughs hard while watching the show and often says "I should try that!" such as wearing a favorite shirt on Monday to make Monday a little more enjoyable. He learns new skills while laughing. It is a nice option for helping kids learn skills and it's received better than parental suggestions.
Good for all ages and family.
Such a good innocent show from when Nick still made quality programs
Silly, not funny, childish.
It's was one of the best shows on Nick

such a pleasant and refreshing show - so glad that my children can watch this show and I do not have to worry about the content.  The awesome thing about this show is that when I do watch with them I laugh my head off too!
Awesome fun!
The show is very funny!  Deals with typical middle school issues in a light and fun way.  Silly &  fun.  My Tweens love it & my 17 yr old & friends all have find memories of the show!
Ned's Declassified should be shown to every middle school/junior high student in the U.S.  Real life, real/true suggestions -  will help kids feel not so "unusual" or "weird".
Very good and funny. Me, my brother, and my sister enjoy it.  I would defiantly recommend it. And some other stuff
This show is a really good show and it might give you some tips. It is also really  funny to me.
I like watching this show because some times it actually helps me with school, and it's very funny, I like watching it. I wish there were more seasons and episodes for me to watch. I love it.
I really like watching this because it's fun to watch and I hope there is another season coming soon .

Even though written to educate and entertain middle school, this show is written very well and the sound affects are in the style of The Three Stooges.
The actors play it over the top but that just adds to the fun.
Even today my  16 year old will sit back and watch.
The only disappointment is not having a season three on DVD..
Pretty fast and a good good product so thanks you again it is a good show so thank you again !!

A collection of 1/2 hourish shows that has a cast of middle school kids you could find in a real school.  Family friendly. No drug references. No sexual references.  A wonderfully upbeat show filled with silliness.
My daughter and I really enjoyed watching this series again. We are waiting for season 3 to come out on CD
My son loves this show. We have Seasons 1-3 over and over again. A definite must watch for pre-teens and adults alike!!

This is great upbeat and clever show - kids will love it - and so will adults. My family loves to watch this show - it has a positive message, that kids can overcome their challenges, and it's portrayed in a funny way they'll appreciate!
A very good show that I watch.  Funny, smart, and good for the entire family.  Great for ages and friends too
I love the easy going serie, When I feel down this helps me to feel good again. Just loves it
I watch this every year to celebrate the end of the school year.  Now I'm writing to fill in space.
This DVD was very good and it has some of the best episodes on it as well and the shipping was fantastic.

I love this show. What really sucks on Amazon Prime is that I am unable to purchase season 2 due to a missing episode. I bought season one already, and want to own it all, but without the option to buy the second season is a super big bummer!
I watched this show all the time when I was younger, very glad that I found it. This show can really brings you back to your childhood days while also giving you a great laugh.

If you haven't seen this show, you need to. We have kids in 3rd and 8th grades and the tips are true and accurate. We and our kids love it!
